title: 278.09 CERTIFIED COPIES TO AUDITOR AND TREASURER.
text: Upon entry of judgment a certified copy thereof shall be delivered to the county auditor and to the county treasurer if the tax list be still in the treasurer's possession, who shall correct the tax list and assessment rolls in accordance with the judgment, writing or stamping opposite such parcel or item of personal property in the tax list a notation "judgment entered" and the date thereof.
